services.question: What services do you offer?
services.answer: We offer comprehensive digital marketing, web development, UX/UI design, branding, and video editing services to help your business grow online.

different.question: What makes Navix different from other agencies?
different.answer: We combine strategic thinking with creative execution, offering personalized solutions tailored to your specific business needs. Our team brings years of experience across multiple industries.

international.question: Do you work with international clients?
international.answer: Yes, we work with clients globally. Our team is equipped to handle projects across different time zones and cultural contexts.

pricing.question: How do you price your services?
pricing.answer: Our pricing is project-based and depends on the scope and complexity of your needs. We provide transparent quotes after understanding your requirements.

workflow.question: What is your typical workflow?
workflow.answer: We start with a strategy session, followed by planning, execution, and regular reviews. We maintain constant communication throughout the project lifecycle.

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. Simple projects may take 2-4 weeks, while comprehensive solutions can take 2-3 months. We'll provide specific timelines during consultation.

LetsMakeThingsHappen.title: Let's make things happen
LetsMakeThingsHappen.description: Contact us today and discover how our digital marketing services can help your business grow and succeed in the digital world.

Guarantees.title: Our guarantees to you.
Guarantees.subtitle: We ensure the highest quality of work, with the fastest delivery times.

rapidExecution.title: Rapid Execution
rapidExecution.description: 90% of projects launched within 14 days using our proven agile workflow

fullStackDevelopment.title: Full-Stack Development
fullStackDevelopment.description: Conversion-optimized websites built with modern tech stacks (Next.js, Tailwind, Shopify)

growthReady.title: Growth-Ready Infrastructure
growthReady.description: Auto-scaling solutions handling 10x traffic spikes without downtime

crossDisciplinary.title: Cross-Disciplinary Teams
crossDisciplinary.description: Dedicated squads of developers, strategists & creatives working in sync

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: GDPR/CCPA compliant solutions with daily vulnerability scans

realTimeTracking.title: Real-Time Performance Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Live dashboards monitoring ROAS, LTV & conversion metrics

priorityResponse.title: Priority Response
priorityResponse.description: 24/7 support with 2-hour SLA for critical issues

roiPricing.title: ROI-First Pricing
roiPricing.description: Flexible plans scaling with your growth - no lock-in contracts

Services.subtitle: All of our services are designed to make your business stand out

webDevelopment.title: Full-Stack Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Convert visitors with lightning-fast, responsive websites built using modern frameworks and optimized for conversions

mediaBuying.title: Strategic Media Buying
mediaBuying.description: Precision-targeted ad campaigns across Google/Meta platforms that maximize your advertising ROI

videoProduction.title: Video Production Suite
videoProduction.description: End-to-end video solutions - from concept development to 4K editing and motion graphics

marketingStrategy.title: Growth Marketing Strategy
marketingStrategy.description: Data-driven roadmaps combining SEO, content, and paid media for sustainable business growth

emailSystems.title: Automated Email Systems
emailSystems.description: Convert leads with personalized drip campaigns and AI-driven behavioral triggers

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Real-time campaign dashboards with conversion optimization recommendations

Hero.description: Schedule a call with us to discuss your business growth goals and how Navix can help you achieve them.

Projects.title: Strategic Campaign Showcase
Projects.subtitle: Explore data-driven campaigns where precision targeting met creative execution to boost client revenue by 150%+.

hero.description: Each project we take on is built around one goal: growth. From boosting ROAS through paid ads to designing landing pages that convert — here's a glimpse of what we've achieved for our partners.

project.readyDescription: Let's collaborate to create something extraordinary. Our team is ready to bring your vision to life.
project.projectSummaryDescription: This project demonstrates our commitment to delivering exceptional results through innovative solutions. Our approach combines strategic thinking with creative execution to drive measurable outcomes.

takeaways.measurable: Delivered measurable results within the timeline
takeaways.scalable: Created a scalable solution for future growth
takeaways.enhanced: Enhanced user experience and engagement metrics

hero.description: we turn struggling businesses into success stories through powerful design, smart media buying, and high-converting marketing strategies.

culture.title: /Culture
culture.description: At Navix, our culture is built on performance, precision, and relentless ambition. Our values are not just words—they are the operating system behind everything we do. They guide how we work, how we think, and how we deliver results. Here's what defines us:

relentlessExecution.title: Relentless Execution
relentlessExecution.description: At Navix, we don't just plan—we deliver. Our focus is on results, precision, and making every campaign count. No excuses, only outcomes.

ownershipResponsibility.title: Ownership and Responsibility
ownershipResponsibility.description: When we commit, we own it. Every result—good or bad—is on us. We fix, improve, and scale until success is the only option.

clientFirst.title: Client-First Mentality
clientFirst.description: We treat every brand like our own. We listen, understand, and act with your growth as the only goal. Your success is our reputation.

calculatedInnovation.title: Calculated Innovation
calculatedInnovation.description: We don't chase trends. We use data, experience, and creativity to find smarter, better, more profitable ways to drive performance.

consistentGrowth.title: Consistent Growth Mindset
consistentGrowth.description: In a fast-moving world, we adapt fast. We learn, test, evolve, and win—again and again. Stagnation is death; progress is our default.

team.title: /Team
team.description: At Navix, we're a squad of specialists obsessed with growth, technology, and high-performance delivery. Every project we take on is driven by precision, creativity, and a bias toward action.
team.descriptionBold: We don't just create solutions — we create momentum, impact, and long-term success.

houssem.name: Daas Houssem
houssem.description: Driven by results and powered by code, I build fast, scalable digital experiences that convert. Whether it's developing full-stack web platforms or crafting high-performing ad campaigns, I bring a growth-focused mindset to every challenge

sabri.name: Chetouane Sabri
sabri.description: I tell stories that sell. From cinematic product showcases to scroll-stopping social content, I blend visual creativity with brand strategy to create assets that leave a lasting impact—and drive performance

hero.title: Let's Connect
hero.description: Tell us about your project through a quick AI-powered conversation, then we'll schedule a strategic session to bring your vision to life.

aiDiscovery.title: AI-Powered Project Discovery
aiDiscovery.description: Our intelligent form asks the right questions to understand your unique needs and goals in just minutes.

personalizedSession.title: Personalized Strategic Session
personalizedSession.description: Based on your responses, we'll prepare a tailored discussion focused on your specific project requirements.

actionableSteps.title: Actionable Next Steps
actionableSteps.description: Walk away with clear recommendations and a roadmap to achieve your business objectives.

AIContactForm.title: Start Your Project Journey
AIContactForm.subtitle: Choose a service to begin our AI-powered conversation
